alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:52AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and light freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Ice accumulation from freezing rain 1/4 inch or less. * WHERE...Juneau and the Icy Strait Corridor including Gustavus and Hoonah. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and ice covered surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches in Mendenhall Valley. Heaviest snowfall rates are expected into early Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
